channel.title: How do i dat arms into platebody?
channel.description:
i found this plate body in the rs cache and decide to make it into a platebody of some kind [IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/wtf.jpg[/img]
how do i fix the arms?
and the same for this in my last topic even though no one posted any tutorial on fixing the arms
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/wtfnoarms-1.jpg[/img]
plz help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 10:07:10 am[/size][hr]dragmagic made a tut on adding anim to models but does it does the same things to arms?

item.title: How do i dat arms into platebody?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

u sure?the last time i did it it screwed up

and heres another picture the legs screwed up

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 10:37:09 am[/size][hr]this happened when i removed the arms

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 10:37:56 am[/size][hr]is it just only the helm that works fine?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 10:42:33 am[/size][hr]

any tut on how to FIX THE ARMS?!!!?!?!?!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i dat arms into platebody?

item.title: How do i dat arms into platebody?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

ok dude you see this code…

class8.anInt165 = 14082;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14082;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves //
or somthing like that put the model id for the sleeves

class8.anInt164 = here;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = and here;//male arms/sleeves //
then compile and run and it should work

Read full topic
